name: The Ritual (WINGEAR)
description:
Also rate  the game on NG plzz:   https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/820188

Since it's Halloween tonight, you decide to make it extravagant and  descend to the Shadow Realm and throw your haloween party here. You've found a perfect spot for the ritual, and the only thing left to descend is to sacrifice the  ghosts trapped in paintings.

Made for the spooktober jam 2021

https://wingear.carrd.co/

#spooktober-jam-2021
